name: Cat Meowio :01 The Beginning HD
description:
Embark on an EPIC journey of PARODY with Cat Meowio against smiling blobs (of evilness) and flying whales...wait what?

Did we mention EVERYTHING wants to kill you?. seriously.

If you can't handle losing (repeatedly over and over and over again), then this game is not for you. This game ruin lives..

GameCenter ENABLED and iOS UNIVERSAL!

More levels coming soon!
